hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Fadl ibn Abbas: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came to us accompanied by Abbas when we were in open country belonging to us. He prayed in a desert with no sutrah in front of him, and a she-ass and a bitch of ours were playing in front of him, but he paid no attention to that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ الْكَلْبُ لاَ يَقْطَعُ الصَّلاَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That A Dog Does Not Nullify The Prayer
